summary: I compression most of the more than 515 * 512 vanilla texture to half of its original size.
descriptionHtml:
TESV Reduced Texture Pack 1.0

=========================================================================================
First please forgive my poor English.

I also know that most computers have don\'t need it, but maybe someone need. So...

=========================================================================================

Descriptions

I compression most of the more than 515 * 512 vanilla texture to half of its original size.Not all the vanilla texture, so please don\'t get to do strange things.

It can reduce 200-400 MB of memory,For little to no visual quality loss, at least in my old computer.Recommended for people with 512 MB video cards.(Thank alt3rn1ty, he reminded me to write the wrong number.)

I have not had time to do a complete test, if there is any error, please delete it.

=========================================================================================
Installation

Download the packages you want to use, extract it to a temporary location and then copy or move the included Textures folder into your \\Skyrim\\Data\\ folder. 


=========================================================================================
Requirement

Skyrim Official Version(v1.1.21.0)

=========================================================================================
Credit

Thanks to 

Bethesda Softworks for this Great Game,Skyrim

NEXUS Manager and moderator team

and many nexus friends.
author: alex30001
